#### What is csrf
csrf is the abbr. for cross-site request forgery.[Cross Site Request Forgery (or XSRF)](https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E8%B7%A8%E7%AB%99%E8%AF%B7%E6%B1%82%E4%BC%AA%E9%80%A0)
